channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- System Update
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- System Update

item.title: CVE-2020-8342|2024-08-04T09:56:28.350Z -- lenovo -- system%20update
item.description: A race condition vulnerability was reported in Lenovo System Update prior to version 5.07.0106 that could allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2019-6163|2024-08-04T20:16:23.827Z -- lenovo -- system%20update
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in Lenovo System Update before version 5.07.0084 that could allow service log files to be written to non-standard locations.

item.title: CVE-2019-6175|2024-08-04T20:16:23.600Z -- lenovo -- system%20update
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in Lenovo System Update versions prior to 5.07.0088 that could allow configuration files to be written to non-standard locations.
